attributes.additional_details: BE HONEST WITH THE UK PEOPLE. TELL THE TRUTH ABOUT THE TRUE IMMIGRATION NUMBERS. TELL THE PEOPLE ABOUT THE MILLIONS OF JOBS TAKEN BY FOREIGN IMMIGRANTS ABOUT THE BILLIONS IN BENEFITS PAID TO IMMIGRANTS, ABOUT THE AMOUNT OF CRIME COMMITED BY THE IMMIGRANTS, STOP LYING TO THE PEOPLE OF THE UK SAYING YOU WILL STOP IMMIGRATION TELL THE TRUTH YOU CANNOT STOP IT BECAUSE EUROPE SAYS SO. TELL THE BRITISH PEOPLE WHO ARE SUFFERING ON BENEFITS WHO CANNOT GET JOBS THE TRUTH OF THE MATTER THEY WILL SUFFER AND THE IMMIGRANTS WILL BENEFIT. TELL THE TRUTH ABOUT THE BEDROOM TAX IT IS NOT ABOUT HAVING TOO MANY BEDROOMS IT IS ABOUT GETTING PEOPLE TO MOVE IN TO SMALLER HOUSES BECAUSE THE GOVERNMENT WILL NEED THE BIGGER HOUSES  FOR THE MILLIONS OF ROMANIANS AND BULGARIANS THAT WILL ARRIVE IN JANUARY 2014. TELL THE BRITISH PEOPLE HE TRUTH THAT THEY WILL DIE OF STARVAION BECAUSE THEY CANNOT FIND WORK BUT THE IMMIGRANTS WILL GET THEIR BENEFITS
